room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Chamber" by Escape NE Ohio in Warren
room_address: 200 Chestnut Avenue Northeast Suite C Warren, OH 44483
room_description:
The founders created a vessel to tether their power into one all-encompassing tome - The Founders’ Libre de Libris also known as the Founders’ Book. Each founders’ contribution empowers yet eternally binds each to the other forming the most powerful magical endeavor in history. Spells, potions, charms, magical creatures, all the magical world’s secrets are found in these pages.
Many people search for the Founders’ Book with ill intent. Locate the Founders’ Book hidden in the Wizard’s Chamber to prevent it from falling into the wrong hands.
